item.title: About
item.description: CDS’s mission is to change government to serve people better. The Policy team supports this mission by helping product teams, communities, and leadership at CDS navigate government processes, overcome barriers, and work as effectively as possible. Who we are John Millons (head of policy) Kaira Bakkestad-Legare Lucas Cherkewski Meghan Hellstern Michael Karlin Nisa Malli Sam Burton Sarah Hobson Sean Boots Sharly Chan Tamreen Arif What we do Our work tends to cover three main areas:

item.title: Publications
item.description: The documents below are listed by year that they were completed. You can see additional metadata and print documents by following the links below: 2020 Description Date completed CDS Web Analytics Policy Checklist Summary: The goal of this checklist is to make it easy for any CDS delivery team to make sure their service’s use of web analytics is in line with the Standard on Privacy and Web Analytics.
